title: Pre-Historic Horniness, Caucasian Movie Commentary, MTH, Black Halloween Hood Outfits and more.
itunes:title: Pre-Historic Horniness, Caucasian Movie Commentary, MTH, Black Halloween Hood Outfits and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Someone stepped up to the plate and could not get a break. This round of questioning from Bitterman for The Chief Love Officer was outright just not fair! We give y'all the things you will hear at the theater when there is no melanin around. Fool #2 murders another one in the spirit of BBD just in time for Halloween. There is nothing like Black Halloween costumes and the innovators behind them. Do you know the signs just before you get dumped? Are your plans for November still on? We also find out what scary movies can do for our primal brain. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks to us about the most solid relationship we could ever form.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
